unnormalised: **New Wheels Alert: Desi Motors Drops Two Hot Rides!**
normalised: **New Wheels Alert: Desi Motors Drops Two Hot Rides!**

unnormalised: Guys, buckle up! Desi Motors just unleashed two shiny new beasts onto the Indian roads. First up, the "Bajrangi Bullet," a rugged SUV perfect for tackling those crazy potholes between Delhi and Jaipur. We're talking serious power and a ground clearance that could shame a speed breaker.
normalised: Guys, buckle up! Desi Motors just unleashed two shiny new beasts onto the Indian roads. First up, the "Bajrangi Bullet," a rugged S U V perfect for tackling those crazy potholes between Delhi and Jaipur. We're talking serious power and a ground clearance that could shame a speed breaker.

unnormalised: Then, there's the "Lakshmi Luxe," a sleek sedan aiming for the premium segment. Think plush interiors, more legroom than your average Mumbai apartment (probably bigger than 200 sq ft!), and enough tech to make Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam proud.
normalised: Then, there's the "Lakshmi Luxe," a sleek sedan aiming for the premium segment. Think plush interiors, more legroom than your average Mumbai apartment (probably bigger than two hundred square feet!), and enough tech to make Doctor A P J Abdul Kalam proud.

unnormalised: No official word on mileage yet, but rumors are the Bullet drinks fuel like it’s chai during Diwali. The Luxe, on the other hand, is apparently a bit more fuel-efficient.
normalised: No official word on mileage yet, but rumors are the Bullet drinks fuel like it’s chai during Diwali. The Luxe, on the other hand, is apparently a bit more fuel-efficient.

unnormalised: Pricing hasn’t been officially announced, but whispers put the Bullet around Rs. 15 lakhs and the Luxe closer to Rs. 25 lakhs. Are they worth it? We’ll let you know after our test drive! Stay tuned for the full scoop. Launching from the Auto Expo, Greater Noida!
normalised: Pricing hasn’t been officially announced, but whispers put the Bullet around rupee fifteen lakhs and the Luxe closer to rupee twenty five lakhs. Are they worth it? We’ll let you know after our test drive! Stay tuned for the full scoop. Launching from the Auto Expo, Greater Noida!
